overview: Craig Dubow was elected Gannettâ€™s chairman effective July 1, 2006. He also continues as Gannett’s president and CEO, positions he has held since July 15, 2005. He also became a member of the Board of Directors at that time. Dubow joined Gannett in 1981 in advertising sales for K*USA-TV in Denver. He held various positions at KVUE-TV in Austin, TX and was named president and general manager in 1990. In 1992, he became president and general manager of Gannettâ€™s NBC affiliate in Atlanta, WXIA-TV. Dubow was executive vice president of Gannett Television from 1996-2000. He was named president of Gannett Broadcasting in 2000, adding CEO to his title in 2001. He was born on Oct. 26, 1954.
